news_header: A terrorist attack in Ankara has resulted in multiple casualties, according to Turkish Interior Minister.
news_text: Turkish Interior Minister Ali Yerkalia reported that several people have been killed and injured in an explosion in Ankara, which he labeled a terrorist attack. The incident occurred at TUSAS, a key weapons manufacturer in Turkey known for producing fighter aircraft, including the KAAN and F-16. While Haber Turk suggested it was a suicide bomber, Turkish authorities have not confirmed this. Reports indicate that several weapons were targeted, and rescue personnel have been dispatched to the scene.
